p: Serum HCV RNA testing 12 weeks after the EoT was performed in 144/174 (82.8%) patients. Finally, 139 patients achieved SVR12. The SVR12 rate in an intention-to-treat analysis (ITT) was 79.9% (139/174), while for those with an SVR12 test available the response rate reached 96.5% (139/144) ( Fig. 1).
